channel.title: Help I get this error when my server crashes
channel.description:
When my server crashes this comes up on CMD
java.lang.NullPointerException
Why and how can i fix

item.title: Help I get this error when my server crashes
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

When you declare an object your generally just creating a pointer towards the object, so your basically setting it to null. This means your referencing the object but it’s pointing towards virtually nothing.

Here’s an example of an NPE error;

String a = null; System.out.println(a.toString());//Throws NullPointerException

You can always try to use a try, catch to try and get the NullPointerException caught, but it’s a bad idea because all it does is mask bad code.

Read full topic
item.source: Help I get this error when my server crashes
